info.name: Cart and Checkout
info.description: A set of requests that illustrate a cart and checkout workflow with the Tessitura API. The Create Session requests saves the generated session key into the sessionKey environment variable. That variable is used in most other requests in this collection. In many places however, you will need to manually copy data from one request to the next in order to string along a workflow.

request.description: Hit Diagnostics/Status to verify service is available
Check if auth header is valid

Login for guest checkout only.

Allows anonymous checkout under constituent 0, attaching the supplied email address to the cart. The session will be marked as a guest login.

If the email address exists attached to a login of the specified login type, that login's constituent ID will be used on the cart.
View all benefits available to add to levels of a single membership organization.
View all levels of a membership organization available to add to the web cart.
View all level benefits (including their limits and frequencies) that will be available to a constituent who purchases the membership level.

Add a membership to the cart by providing the level.

There must be a campaign attached to the membership organization of level you are supplying. The Campaign must be attached to an active Fund.

Upgrade the user's current membership by providing a higher level (membership level must be a included in a membership organization which is tied to the campaign that is associated with the Fund Id provided).
Renew the user's current membership by providing a level (membership level must be a included in a membership organization which is tied to the campaign that is associated with the Fund Id provided).

This call has the current session's user purchasing a membership for another user, a.k.a. the recipient.

The Fund Id provided must be attached to a campaign that is attached to a membership organization.

Add a membership to the cart by providing the amount.

The Fund Id provided must be attached to a campaign that is attached to a membership organization.

Upgrade the user's current membership by the amount of money provided.

The Fund Id provided must be attached to a campaign that is attached to a membership organization.

Renew the user's current membership by providing a new amount.

The Fund Id provided must be attached to a campaign that is attached to a membership organization.

This call has the current session's user purchasing a membership for another user, a.k.a. the recipient.

The Fund Id provided must be attached to a campaign that is attached to a membership organization.
Get all level benefits for a constituent by Constituent Id. The constituent must have a membership and did not decline benefits of that membership.
Remove a membership from the cart by membership Id.

item.name: Update Cart Properties with Default MOS and Source

exec: tests["#1391, CartActionBalanceToCharge, 11 - Load order into cart.  BalanceToCharge=65."] = data.BalanceToCharge === 65 && data.CartAmount === 75 && data.AmountPaidPreviously === 10;

body.raw:
{
  "CreditCardOwner": "Guy Smiley",
  "CreditCardNumber": "5454545454545454",
  "CreditCardType": 33,
  "CreditCardMonth": 10,
  "CreditCardYear": 2023,
  "Amount": 150.00,
  "AllowUnderPayment": false,
  "Authorize": true,
  "ZipCode": "63119",
  "Address": "123 Fourth St.",
  "ECommerce": true,
  "StoreAccount": true
}
